name: Project brief (For website)
description:
Project brief template for web designers.


The brief is used for getting project requirements. There is no 'only right answer' in using this brief. You can use it however you want.


If you don't know how to work with project briefs I suggest reading articles and watching tutorials.


Here are some useful links:


  • Using project briefs to develop the full potential of Agile teams
  • How to write a project brief
  • 5 stpes to writing a clear project brief
